name: The Search (itch) (Torch of Freedom)
description:
The Search is a small Lost Relics Games game jam horror game, based in the house that is inspired by one from Conjuring 1. Little girl named Bella lost her teddy and cant find it, but can you help her? Your flashlight is your only source of light, so since your bond is so strong, if you get out of battery you die... You can find some old batteries in various chests and closets around the house. So take care of your connection because if one dies other goes with it.

Commands:

A and D are movement keys.

Use E to pick up flashlight and open doors, drawers, flip switch.

SPACE key is used to go upper or lower floor if you are near stairs or doors(1st floor Red circle).
